Name: set_alarm
Description: Sets an alarm for the given time
Param1Description: The given time in HH:MM 24H format
Param2Description: the message or the name of the alarm

Name: set_timer
Description: Sets a timer for a given period
Param1Description: The given time period in HH:MM:SS format
Param2Description: the message or the name of the reminder

Name: take_picture
Example: take a picture or open camera
Description: opens camera application in picture mode

Name: record_video
Description: opens camera application in video mode

Name: search_web
Example: search for the term something on the internet or web or online
Description: Searches the web with the given query parameter
Param1Description: The thing to search on the internet

Name: bluetooth_on
Description: turns on bluetooth

Name: settings
Description: Opens general settings

Name: wifi_settings
Description: Opens wifi settings

Name: wireless_settings
Description: Opens wireless settings

Name: airplane_settings
Description: Opens airplane mode settings

Name: apn_settings
Description: opens apn settings

Name: bluetooth_settings
Description: Opens bluetooth settings

Name: date_settings
Description: opens date settings

Name: locale_settings
Description: Opens locale settings

Name: input_settings
Description: Opens input method settings

Name: display_settings
Description: Opens display settings

Name: security_settings
Description: Opens security settings

Name: location_settings
Description: opens location source settings

Name: internalstorage_settings
Description: Opens internal storage settings

Name: memorycard_settings
Description: opens memory card settings

Name: create_note
Description: Creates a note or a reminder
Param2Description: the subject or the name of the note

Name: add_event
Example: add an event to my calendar on the 5th of august
Description: Adds an event on the name title to the calendar
Param1Description: The title for the calendar event
Param2Description: the start date of the event in MM.dd. format

Name: start_call
Description: Starts a call with the given person
Param1Description: The name of the given person

Name: send_text
Description: Sends a text to a person
Param1Description: The name of the given person

Name: play_music
Description: Plays a music based on a search query
Param1Description: The query, it can be a name or a music, or both
